about_the_game:
Slender - A Crooked Manifestation is a First Person Perspective, Single-Player survival horror game, where the line between reality and nightmare blurs. After being caught in a violent ocean storm, you wash ashore a desolate island that holds the remnants of a forgotten past.

As a lone survivor navigating the haunting environment of treacherous islands and dark caves, you’ll uncover dark secrets and face the terror lurking in the shadows.

Your mission? Navigate through the hostile terrain, gathering essential resources like batteries, health kit, and essentials to survive. Along the way, collect pages scattered throughout the island to uncover secrets and build knowledge about the sinister past of this haunting place with the help of a lost companion from your past and escape. Every area holds pieces of the story, drawing you closer to understanding the dark forces at work.

But beware, the malevolent force that seeks to trap you is not far behind. Will you last long enough without becoming the next victim of Slenderman?

Key Features

  • Atmospheric Survival Horror: A first-person experience that combines survival mechanics with psychological terror. Prepare for relentless tension as you scavenge, explore, and fight to survive against the unknown forces hunting you.

  • Strategic Stealth Mechanics: The more you’re seen, the greater the danger. Hide in the dense forest, crouch through the island's decaying ruins, and avoid detection as you solve puzzles and manage limited resources to stay alive.

  • Terrifying Encounters: Face an evolving, omnipresent horror that can strike from anywhere. With each passing night, the Slenderman grows stronger, and your survival becomes even more perilous.

  • A Companion from the Past: In this horrible journey—you’d find someone from your past who will guide you by becoming your ray of hope.

WARNING: PHOTOSENSITIVITY/EPILEPSY SEIZURES (READ THIS NOTICE BEFORE PLAYING)

A very small percentage of people may experience epileptic seizures or blackouts when exposed to certain kinds of flashing lights or light patterns. These persons, or even people who have no history of seizures or epilepsy, may experience epileptic symptoms or seizures while playing video games. If you or any of your relatives has an epileptic condition or has had seizures of any kind, consult your physician before playing any video game.

IMMEDIATELY DISCONTINUE use and consult a physician if you or your child experience any of the following symptoms: dizziness, altered vision, eye or muscle twitching, involuntary movements, loss of awareness, disorientation, or convulsions. Parents should watch for or ask their children about the above symptoms.

Join the Community

Follow us on our social media channels for the latest updates, sneak peeks, and behind-the-scenes content as we prepare for the full release of Slender: A Crooked Manifestation. Join our community of horror enthusiasts and share your survival stories!

Wishlist Now!

Don’t miss your chance to embark on this terrifying journey. Wishlist Slender: A Crooked Manifestation now and be among the first to experience the horror!
